shape.organizing_principle: Feature-based decomposition by mob management capabilities
shape.increment_strategy: Vertical slices delivering end-to-end mob functionality
shape.decomposition_approach: User capability level (GM can create mob, GM can apply strategy, GM can execute attack), integration points with Foundry VTT system, technical complexity (UI, strategy engine, combat integration)

prioritization_factors.must_have: Core mob grouping and basic attack execution

key_milestones: Basic mob creation and unified action execution
